entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 7:13 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -13.7°C
Wind: NNW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
